comments.body: The latest console host supports input redirection, but needs to be much improved, starting with #984, to eliminate exceptions caused by using PowerShell without a TTY. We also need to enable and fix multiple [ConsoleHost tests](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/powershell/ConsoleHost.Tests.ps1).

title: Fix pending ConsoleHost tests
